title: Accessibility problems
description: When launching the Help view, the tab key does not have any effect until I first click on one of the interactive areas such as the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame.
OB: When launching the Help view, the tab key does not have any effect until I first click on one of the interactive areas such as the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame.
EB: When launching the Help view, the tab key should immediately start working without the need for clicking on any interactive areas.
SR:
1. Open the Help view.
2. Attempt to navigate using the tab key.
3. Observe that the tab key does not work until you first click on one of the interactive areas such as the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame.
